short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely generate a digital identity for testing and privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online privacy with Throwaway, a tool for safe, fast, and anonymous browsing. Whether you’re testing websites, filling out forms, or just keeping your personal data under wraps, Throwaway has you covered.

Features:
🚀 Turbo-fast Autofilling: Fill out forms with a single click—no more repetitive typing.

🔓 No Signup Required & No Data Storage: Get started immediately without creating an account. Throwaway never stores your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

✉️ Disposable Email Inbox: Generate throwaway email addresses on the fly to keep your inbox clean and secure.

🎯 Custom Fields: Tailor your autofill settings to fit any form, making your experience both flexible and powerful.

🔒 Privacy-First Design: Use randomly generated valid data to protect your identity across the web, ensuring your personal information stays private.

💻 Open Source: Throwaway is fully open source and always will be.

Why Choose Throwaway?
Throwaway is perfect for developers, testers, and privacy-conscious users who need a quick and reliable way to interact with forms online. With a clean and intuitive interface, you’ll enjoy a seamless experience that integrates effortlessly with your workflow.
